MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-JAN-2021 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the SY19 postcode area of Llanbrynmair, affecting properties in Pennant, Llan, and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and due to additional work required our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00PM We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.00PM on 12th January 2021
